languages.text: "Эти ублюдки были в шаге от того, чтобы нас сгубить". {n}Соломон пристально смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Знаешь, я тогда подумал, что было бы лучше — сгинуть с тобой или выжить, но помнить, как я тебя не уберег. И обрадовался, когда понял, что нам обоим конец".

"Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."
languages.original_text: "Эти ублюдки были в шаге от того, чтобы нас сгубить". {n}Соломон пристально смотрит вам в глаза.{/n} "Знаешь, я тогда подумал, что было бы лучше — сгинуть с тобой или выжить, но помнить, как я тебя не уберег. И обрадовался, когда понял, что нам обоим конец".

I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

"Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

languages.text: « Ces salopards étaient à de deux doigts de nous avoir. Honnêtement, {n}continue-t-il en vous regardant droit dans les yeux,{/n} à ce moment, je me suis demandé ce qui serait le mieux : mourir à vos côtés ou survivre en sachant que je n'avais pas réussi à vous protéger. Je me suis réjoui quand j'ai cru que la mort venait nous prendre tous les deux. »
languages.original_text: "Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

traits.locale_text: « Ces salopards étaient à de deux doigts de nous avoir. Honnêtement, {n}continue-t-il en vous regardant droit dans les yeux,{/n} à ce moment, je me suis demandé ce qui serait le mieux : mourir à vos côtés ou survivre en sachant que je n'avais pas réussi à vous protéger. Je me suis réjoui quand j'ai cru que la mort venait nous prendre tous les deux. »

languages.text: 「あいつらは、あと一歩で私たちを潰すところでした」{n}ソロモーンはじっとあなたの目を見つめた。{/n}「実は…あの時、私は考えました。あなたと一緒に死んだほうがいいのか、それとも…あなたを守れなかったという事実を背負って生き残るほうがいいのか、と。共に終わりを迎えるのだと気づいたとき、私は心から嬉しかったんです」
languages.original_text: "Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

traits.locale_text: 「あいつらは、あと一歩で私たちを潰すところでした」{n}ソロモーンはじっとあなたの目を見つめた。{/n}「実は…あの時、私は考えました。あなたと一緒に死んだほうがいいのか、それとも…あなたを守れなかったという事実を背負って生き残るほうがいいのか、と。共に終わりを迎えるのだと気づいたとき、私は心から嬉しかったんです」

languages.text: «Esos degenerados estuvieron a un paso de acabar con nosotros». {n}Solomorne te mira fijamente a los hombros.{/n} «¿Sabe? En su momento pregunté qué sería preferible: si morir a su lado o sobrevivir sabiendo que no había podido proteger su vida. Cuando supe que todo había terminado, no cabía en mí de alegría».
languages.original_text: "Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

traits.locale_text: «Esos degenerados estuvieron a un paso de acabar con nosotros». {n}Solomorne te mira fijamente a los hombros.{/n} «¿Sabe? En su momento pregunté qué sería preferible: si morir a su lado o sobrevivir sabiendo que no había podido proteger su vida. Cuando supe que todo había terminado, no cabía en mí de alegría».

languages.text: “那些人渣差一点就把我们害死了。”{n}索罗蒙目不转睛，凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“老实说，有时候我不禁在想，究竟哪个结果更加可怕——是死在你身边，还是存活下来，但却没能保住你的安全。那个时候，当我意识到我们两个终于活下来了的时候，我真的高兴得要发疯了。”
languages.original_text: "Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

traits.locale_text: “那些人渣差一点就把我们害死了。”{n}索罗蒙目不转睛，凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“老实说，有时候我不禁在想，究竟哪个结果更加可怕——是死在你身边，还是存活下来，但却没能保住你的安全。那个时候，当我意识到我们两个终于活下来了的时候，我真的高兴得要发疯了。”

languages.text: "Adiler az daha işimizi bitiriyordu." {n}Solomorne, ihtiyatla gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "O an içimden neler geçti bir bilsen... Senin yanı başında ölmek mi yoksa seni koruyamadığımı bile bile yaşamak mı daha iyi olur diye düşündüm. İkimizin de kurtulamayacağını fark ettiğimde sevinçten havalara uçtum."
languages.original_text: "Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

traits.locale_text: "Adiler az daha işimizi bitiriyordu." {n}Solomorne gözlerinin içine ihtiyatla bakıyor.{/n} "O an içimden neler geçti bir bilsen... Senin yanı başında ölmek mi, yoksa seni koruyamadığımı bile bile yaşamak mı? İkimizin de kurtulamayacağını fark ettiğimde sevinçten havalara uçtum."

languages.text: "Diese Bastarde hätten uns um ein Haar gekriegt." {n}Solomorne blickt dir fest in die Augen.{/n} "Wisst, Ihr, als ich mich fragte, was wohl besser ist ... an Eurer Seite zu sterben oder mit dem Wissen zu überleben, dass ich nicht für Eure Sicherheit sorgen konnte. Ich war überglücklich, als ich erkannte, dass unser beider Ende gekommen war."
languages.original_text: "Those bastards were one step away from bringing us down." {n}Solomorne stares intently into your eyes.{/n} "You know, at the time I wondered what would be better: dying alongside you, or surviving with the knowledge that I had failed to keep you safe. I was overjoyed when I realised the end had come for both of us."

Ich war überglücklich, als ich erkannte, dass unser beider Ende gekommen war."
